269667.「よう！ お前も 四天の星巡りの挑戦者か？:
Hey! Are you also one of the Four Heavenly
Trials' challengers?

269668.「……アンタが 英雄だって？\n ボーっとしたツラしちゃって\n さえないヤツだ:
...YOU'RE a champion? Absent minded, and
not inspiring at all... You're pretty run of
the mill, aren't you...

269669.「まぁ そう言うなよ！\n コイツ ボンヤリしてるようで じつは\n むちゃくち:
Hey, don't say things like that! Maybe they
are absent minded, but who knows? Maybe
they're really, really strong!

269670.「でも お前 運がいいぜ。\n アストルティア史上 いちばんの大英雄である\n:
You should consider yourself lucky. You have
the honor of meeting us, the greatest
champions in Astoltia's history!

269671.「ほらほら！ もっと喜べよ！\n どうしてもって言うなら\n 握手くらいなら し:
Hey, come on! You should be thankful! Tell you
what, if you want, I will at least shake your
hand!

269672.「……兄ちゃん 兄ちゃん。\n このヒト ボクたちのこと\n 全然 知らないみた:
Uh, bro... It seems like they have no idea
who we are...

269673.「な 何ィーーーーーーーーーーッ！！？\n お前 オレたちのこと 知らねえのか！:
W.... WHAAAAAAAAAAAAAT?!
You really don't know anything about us?!

269674.「……ハハッ！ しかたねえなぁ～。\n 同じ英雄の よしみで\n 特別に 名乗っ:
Heh heh! Oh, well. Anyways, as a polite
gesture amongst us champions, I'll do the
honors of introducing us all...

269675.「我ら ドワチャッカ大陸に羽ばたきし\n 自由の翼！:
We are the wings of liberty, soaring to every
corner of Dwachakka!

269676.「山神イプチャルの加護を受け\n 大陸にはびこる 魔物を打ち倒し……\n 民を:
With the blessing of the great mountain god
Yppchal, we shall defeat the monsters that
infest our lands...and save our people!

269677.「ドワチャッカ大陸を開拓せし 大英雄……っ！\n その名は……:
The great champion who pioneered the lands of
Dwachakka! Their name is...

269682.「……ってなワケだ。\n カルサドラ火山にある オレたちの像\n 見たことくらい:
...and that's that. You've probably seen the
statue of us atop the Calsadora Volcano,
right?

269683.「天使に聞いたんだが オレたちが 死んだあと\n とびきり でっかいのが 建てら:
That angel told us that after we had died,
there was a giant statue erected in our honor.
Truly something to be grateful for!

269684.「そうだ。お前のことを 聞いてなかったな。\n どんな英雄なんだ？:
Ah, right. You haven't told us about yourself
yet. So, what kind of champion are you?

269685.「勇者の盟友だと！？\n 始まりの大魔王 ゴダを撃退した\n あの勇者の盟友なの:
The ally of the Hero?! The same Hero who
defeated the first Demon Lord, Goda?!
What is your name?

269686.「……なーんだ。違うのか。\n 勇者と盟友って 何組もいたんだな。\n ま！ よ:
...What? Guess you're not then. Heroes and
their allies... There are so many of them...
Anyways, nice to meet you, <pc>!

269687.「見ろよ……あの神殿を。\n あの荘厳な神殿で 試練とやらが\n おこなわれるに:
See that temple over there? A majestic looking
building like that probably has something to
do with our trial, don't you think?

269689.「お 黄金の試練だっけ……。\n どんな試練 なのかな？:
T...the Golden Trial... What kind of trial
is it, I wonder...?

269690.「なんてったって 黄金の試練だぜ。\n 立ちふさがる強敵……未知への大冒険！\n:
It is the GOLDEN Trial after all. A great adventure into the unknown with formidable enemies standing in our way...and who knows!
Treasure could be just around the corner!

269691.「だが！ 何が待ち受けていようと\n オレたち三闘士なら 楽勝さ！\n 英雄のチ:
However! No matter what comes our way, the
Triad can handle it! Let's show 'em what us
champions are made of!

269692.「よぉし！ これより あの神殿に突撃する！\n 気合入れて いくぞッ！:
Yeah! Come on, let's go storm that temple!
Full steam ahead!

269694.「おーーーいッ！\n 何 ボーッとしてんだーー！？:
Heeeeeeeey! What are you doing just standing
and staring?!

269695.「お前も 試練受けるんだろ！？\n 早くしねえと おいてくぞーーー！！:
You're doing the trial too, right? Hurry up
or you'll be left in our dust!

269698.「……いらっしゃいませっ！\n ほしいものが あれば\n なんでも おっしゃって:
Welcome, welcome! If there is anything that
you'd like, please feel free to ask!

269699.「い いらっしゃいませ……？\n 未知への大冒険……は？:
"Welcome, welcome"....? What about our
grand adventure into the unknown...?

269700.「おや？ あなたたちは もしかして……。: Huh? By any chance, are you all...?

269701.「ここは……？\n 私 どうして こんなところにいるのかしら。:
Where am I...? What am I doing in such a
strange place?

269702.「俺は……教会に いたはずだ。\n 願いを 聞きとどけてもらおうと\n 神に 祈:
I...was just in church... I was offering
a prayer so that my wishes might be
granted...

269703.「あなたは……もしや 天使様か！？\n ついに ワシにも お迎えがきたのか……ッ:
Are...are you an angel?! Is it finally my
time...?!

269704.「なんだ コイツら？\n どこから わいて出やがった！:
Who the heck are these people?! And where
did they even come from?!

269705.「ようこそ アストルティアの民よ。\n あなたたちの願いを かなえてくれる品々を:
Welcome, citizens of Astoltia. Here you will
find many goods that will fulfill even your
deepest desires.

269706.「天星の果実ですね？\n お買い上げ ありがとうございます！\n これで あなた:
A starfruit, was it? Thank you for your
purchase! Now your wish will surely come
true.

269707.「ここ お店みたいに 見えるけど……。\n もしかして ボクたち 試練の場所\n:
This place looks like a store of some kind...
Are we in the wrong place for the trial...?

269708.「なぁ 兄者！ どうするんだい？: Hey, bro! What should we do?

269709.「願いを かなえてくれる品だって……！\n じゃあ キレーなオネーチャンたちに\:
Goods that'll make your wishes come true...!
Maybe there's some potion that'll make all
the pretty ladies fall in love with me!!

269711.「失礼しました。あなたたちは\n 四天の星巡りの 挑戦者だったのですね。\n で:
My apologies. You are all challengers of the
Four Heavenly Trials, yes? Allow me to greet
you all once again...

269712.「僕は クリュトス。\n 黄金の試練の 審判の天使であり\n この祈願の神殿を:
My name is Krutos. I am the Angel of Judgment
for the Golden Trial, and the custodian of
this Gratitemple.

269714.「ここは 太古の昔より アストルティアから\n 訪れし者に 奇跡を与える場……\:
Since time immemorial, this place has bestowed
miracles to those from Astoltia...a place
where their wishes can come true.

269715.「さっきのヤツら\n アストルティアから 来てたのかい！？\n でも いったい:
Those people just now...they came from
Astoltia?! But how is that possible?

269716.「彼らは 心から かなえたい願いを抱えて\n ここへ導かれた。ヒトの強固なる想い:
Their strong desire for their wish to be fulfilled led them here. Those desires of mortals are possible of creating miracles,
leading them here to the skies above.

269717.「ご心配なく。\n 彼らは無事に アストルティアへと 帰ります。\n もっとも:
There's no need to worry as they will safely
return to Astoltia. Although, they do not
remember ever coming here...

269718.「僕は 彼らの願いをかなえる アイテムを与え\n 対価として 彼らのもつ 感謝の:
I give them something that fulfills their
wish, and in return, I am allowed to collect
their Gratituity.

269720.「アストルティアの人々が生み出す\n 感謝の気持ちには 計り知れないほどの\n:
The gratitude that is expressed by Astoltia's
people contains a sort of energy that is
simply immeasurable.

269721.「ヒトが生きるのに 火や水を使うのと同じように\n 僕ら天使は 人々からの感謝の:
Just as mortals use things like fire and water
for survival, us angels use Gratituity to
allow us to live in the Firmament.

269722.「僕は 天星郷に住む天使たちの生活を\n 支えるために この祈願の神殿で\n 感:
My role is to collect Gratituity in this
temple in order to support those living in
the Firmament.

269723.「だったら 普通に 願いをかなえて\n いくらでも感謝してもらえば いいじゃない:
If that's true, then why not just grant every
wish and have people thank you? Why go
to all the trouble of running a store?

269724.「残念ながら 彼らから 感謝のエネルギーを\n 直接回収するのは とても非効率な:
Unfortunately for us, it's very inefficient to
collect Gratituity directly from them. We
barely get a fraction of it that way...

269725.「しかし 研究の結果 僕は突きとめました。\n 人々が使用する貨幣……ゴールドに:
But after some research, I finally figured it
out. The money people use, Gold...it tends
to contain plenty of Gratituity!

269726.「……というワケで エネルギーを 効率的に\n 回収するために この神殿で アイ:
That's why, in order to collect energy
efficiently, I sell goods here to make money.
A fine idea, don't you think?

269727.「なんて言うか……天使って 変わってんだなぁ。:
Well, what can I say...these angels are quite
the strange bunch...

269728.「では さっそく あなたたちに\n 黄金の試練を 課しましょう……。\n 試練の:
With that, let us begin the Golden Trial...
And the trial is...

269729.「この神殿で みなさんで協力して\n １００万ゴールド 稼いでくださいっ。:
Please assist me in earning one million
Gold here in this shop!

269731.「ちょ ちょっと待ちなよ！\n 英雄の試練なんだろ！？\n どうして 商売なんか:
H-hey! Wait a minute! This is supposed to
be a trial for champions!! And now we have
to help run a store...?!

269732.「人々の願いをかなえ 幸福をもたらすのも\n 英雄の役目です。これを 乗り越えら:
It is a champion's role to grant wishes and
bring about happiness. If you cannot, then
your Soul Candelabra will never be lit.

269733.「ここで みなさんが １００万ゴールド稼ぎ\n 僕が 感謝のエネルギーを回収する:
Your trial will be complete once one million
Gold has been earned and I have collected the
Gratituity. I accept no objections!

269734.「ガーーッハッハッハ！ 面白いじゃねえか！\n 商売だろうがなんだろうが やって:
Gahahahahah! Never would've thought! Even if
it's running a shop, we'll do it! Nothing is
too much for the Triad!!

269735.「まったく 兄者ときたら……\n いつも 勝手に 決めちゃうんだから。\n ま:
Jeez, of course...you always make up your
mind without asking everyone else what they
think. What can you do?

269737.「アンタも ハラくくんな！\n キリキリ 働いてもらうからね。\n サボったりす:
Hey, you! Don't be shy! You gotta work hard
too. This is no time to slack off!

269738.「では 具体的な 商売の手順について\n もう少し くわしく お話ししましょう。:
Now then, I'll explain more about the specific
business procedures we use here. If you would
please come this way...

269739.「これで 母さんの病気が 治せる……。\n 本当に ありがとうございます！:
This will definitely cure my mother's
disease...thank you so much!

269742.「なんか なつかしいな。\n こうしてると ドワチャッカ大陸での日々を\n 思い:
This really takes me back...
It reminds me of the days when we were still
in Dwachakka...

269743.「お前 オレたちが どういう英雄なのか\n 知らないって 言ってたな。\n 思い:
You mentioned earlier that you don't really
know anything about us. I'll go ahead and tell
you, just for the sake of reminiscing.

269744.「この時代から ４０００年ほど前……\n あの頃の ドワチャッカ大陸は およそ\:
It was about 4000 years ago...back then, the
continent of Dwachakka was not a place
suitable for people to live on.

269745.「凶悪な魔物たちに支配され 大地は荒れ果て……\n オレたち ドワーフは 山奥や:
The land was desolate and overrun with vicious
monsters.... The Dwarves lived miserable
lives, hiding inside mountains and caves.

269746.「外に出れば 魔物に殺される。\n だけど 穴の中には ロクに食べ物なんてなく\:
If they tried to go outside, the monsters would kill them...but that was the only place they could reliably find food. They were left
with nothing but hunger and suffering...

269747.「子供のころから 毎日ずっと\n 外には 恐ろしい魔物が たくさんいるから\n:
Ever since I was little, I was always told
never to go outside because of all the
horrible monsters.

269748.「大人も子供も 暗い顔をしてて……\n みんな 生きることを あきらめてしまって:
Adults and children alike were gloomy...
Everyone had just given up on life...

269749.「……だが。オレは 穴ぐらの中で\n 一生を終えることなんて 耐えられなかった。:
But...I couldn't bear to spend the rest of my
life stuck in some hole in the ground.

269750.「なぜ オレたちは こんな目に\n あわなきゃならない？ 暗い穴の中で\n 死を:
"Why do we have to suffer like this?" I
thought. Living our lives in a dark hole, just
waiting to die...that's no way to live!

269751.「オレは 毎日 自由を夢見ていた。\n 輝く太陽の下に 飛び出したかった。:
Every day, I dreamed about freedom. I wanted
to soar freely under the shining sun.

269752.「だから 兄弟分のナンナとドルタムを連れて\n 命がけの旅に 出たのさ。\n オ:
That's why I took these siblings of mine on
a deadly journey...to grab hold of the world
that we lived in.

269753.「あのときも 兄者が 強引に決めちゃってさ。\n 毎日のように 魔物と戦うハメに:
My brother made decisions for us even back
then. We fought against many monsters...
and let me tell you, it wasn't easy.

269754.「魔物は とっても強くて\n 何度も 死にそうになったけど……\n ３人でチカラ:
The monsters were very strong, and there were
too many close calls to count, but...the three
of us pulled through and survived.

269755.「そしたらね。ボクらの戦いを見た\n ドワーフのみんなが 穴の中から出てきて\n:
And then...the other Dwarves saw us fighting,
so they came out of their holes and started
to help us.

269756.「アタシたちについてくる者 宿を貸してくれる者\n ……たくさんのドワーフたちが:
Many Dwarves supported us on our journey....
Some to follow us, others to provide us
accommodations...

269757.「アタシたちが 魔物を倒して\n 住めそうな土地を 切り拓いて……:
They helped us drive away the monsters and
carved out lands suitable for us to live in...

269758.「みんなで協力して クワで土地を耕して\n 家を建てて。少しずつ 少しずつ 地上:
We all worked together, plowing the land with
tools and building houses...little by little,
Dwarf settlements began rising up.

269759.「最終的には 数えきれないほどのドワーフが\n アタシたちに ついてきちゃってさ:
By the end of it all, countless Dwarves were
following us. Our caravan was huge.

269760.「大陸を巡り 魔物どもを倒し続け……\n 何年もかけて オレたちは ついに\n:
After years of traveling around the continent
and slaying monsters, we finally made it
from one end to the other.

269761.「あの日の アイツらの顔\n 今でも 忘れられないぜ……。:
I'll never forget the looks on all of their
faces that day...

269762.「やっと 自由と平和を 手に入れて\n 喜びで 顔が キラキラ輝いてるんだ。\n:
We finally reached the freedom and peace we
so longed for, their faces shining with joy...
Just like the customers in this shop.

269763.「オレたちは すでに死んじまった身ではあるが\n アイツらの……ドワチャッカ大陸:
And although we are already dead, we still
want to protect those smiling faces for all
the people of Dwachakka.

269764.「それが オレの新しい夢だ。\n そのためのチカラを 手に入れるために\n オレ:
That is my new dream. In order to gain the
power necessary to do that, we decided to
undergo the Four Heavenly Trials.

269765.「……そういや お前は？\n 偉大なるチカラを 手に入れたら\n 何をするつもり:
...well? What about you? What will you do
once you receive that great power?

269766.「悪い！ 変な質問しちまった。\n そんなの気軽に 話せることじゃないよな。:
Sorry! I know it's a personal question. Not
something you can just bring up in casual
conversation, is it?

269767.「……よーし！ 仕事再開だ！\n ここからは オレかナンナ\n 好きな方を選んで:
...All right! Back to work! Whether it's me
or the two of them, you can choose whomever
you like to help out with their tasks!

269768.「１００万ゴールドまで 道のりは長いが\n <pc>とオレたちに 不可能はない！:
A million Gold is a long way away, but with
the four of us together, nothing can stop us!
Let's do our best!

269769.「だいぶ 貯まってきたけど……\n まだまだ 目標には 程遠いね。:
We've earned quite a bit, but...we're still
pretty far from our goal.

269771.「……うわーーーん！\n もーヤダ！ もー飽きた！\n もっと 手っ取り早く 稼:
....Waaaaaahhh! No more! I'm so bored!!
Isn't there a faster way to earn money?!?

269772.「はぁ！？ 何言ってるんだい！\n がんばろうって言ったの 兄者じゃないか！:
What are you going off about now? Was it not
you who said we should do our best?!

269773.「もう チマチマと\n キラキラ拾うの 飽きたんだよ！\n 飽きた飽きた飽きた:
I'm sick of picking up every little shiny spot
one by one! I'm sick of it! Sick of it!
SICK! OF! IT!

269774.「……こ この バカ兄者ッ！\n たるみきった根性 たたき直してやるから\n そ:
You...big idiot! I'll knock some motivation
into that stupid head of yours!

269775.「げげっ！？\n ナ ナンナ 早まるな！\n 冗談！ 冗談だってば……！！:
H-hey!! No need to rush! I was just kidding!
It was a joke, I swear...!!

269776.「うるさぁーーい！\n バカバカバカバカ！ 大バカ兄者ぁーーーッ！！:
Shut uuuuup! You big, stupid, idiot!
You are the biggest idiot!!

269778.「気にしないでね。\n ふたりのアレは いつものことだから……。:
No need to worry about it. They do that to
each other all the time...

269779.「カブ兄ちゃんは バカ正直で\n ナンナ姉ちゃんは 生真面目で……\n どっちも:
Kabu is foolishly honest, and Nanna is sincere
to a fault...both of them are frank, so their
opinions often butt heads.

269780.「でも ああやって ぶつかることができるのは\n ふたりが 本当に仲良しな 証拠:
But the fact they can butt heads like that means they really are that close of friends. It's like the saying goes... "A spat is the
evidence you get along..."

269781.「……ボクね。また こうやって\n ３人 一緒に 過ごすことができて\n とても:
You know...I really am happy that the three of
us can spend time together like this again.

269782.「ドワチャッカ大陸を踏破した後\n ボクたちは ３つの大集落を作って\n それぞ:
After we had took control of Dwachakka, we
established three major settlements and
each led one of them...

269783.「みんな 離ればなれになって……\n 長のつとめが忙しくて なかなか\n 会う機:
We'd all been separated...we were so busy
with our duties as leaders that we had no
time to see one another.

269784.「それまで ずっと一緒に冒険してたのに\n ふたりに会えなくなって\n すごく…:
We had been adventuring together for so long,
and I missed the both of them so much...
so very much...

269785.「ドルタム！ 何 辛気くさい顔してんだよ！\n 困ったことが あったら いつだっ:
Doltam! What's with the long face?! Didn't I
tell you that you could tell your brother
about any problems you're having?

269786.「兄者が しっかりしないから\n ドルタムだって 困ってるんだろ！\n まったく:
Doltam's problem is that you won't pull
yourself together! Sheesh...

269787.「……ううん なんでもないよ\n 兄ちゃん 姉ちゃん。\n 心配してくれて あり:
Uh uh, it's nothing to worry about, you
guys. Thanks for worrying about me.

269788.「でも……確かに なかなか\n お金が貯まらないのは 困ったね。\n 何か いい:
But...a big problem is that it's pretty
hard to earn money. Is there no better
way...?

269790.「……いらっしゃいませ！\n 何かご入り用ですか？ 願いをかなえる品々を\n な:
Welcome, welcome! How can I help you? We
have everything you need to make all of your
wishes come true!

269791.「なんでも 願いをかなえてくださる？: You will grant anything that I wish?

269792.「なんと すばらしいのでしょう！\n わたくし どうしても\n 手に入れてほしい:
How wonderfully marvelous it is!
There is something I absolutely must have!

269793.「できる限りの お代を \n お支払いさせていただきますわ。\n わたくしの願い:
I am willing to pay the utmost compensation
for fulfilling my wish! Please do me this
favor!

269803.「おいコラァッ！\n それはオレたちの金だ！ 返しやがれ！！: Hey, you! That's OUR money! Give it back!!

269804.「この世の金は すべて我のもの……。\n 憎き金持ちどもに 渡してなるものか……:
All money in the world belongs to me...I will
not allow the rich and hateful to have it...

269805.「我は この金を使い……今度こそ……。:
I shall use this money...this time, for
sure...

269806.「待てーーッ！\n この 金庫ドロボーーーッ！！: Come back! You damn safe stealer!!!

269859.「ハハン 弱っちいねぇ……。\n アタシと戦おうなんて\n １０００年早いよ！:
Haha, what a bunch of weaklings!
You're a thousand years too young to fight me!
Come back after you've grown up a bit!

269861.「ガーッハッハ！ ドワチャッカ大陸の\n 魔物どもを 一掃したんだ。\n これく:
Gahahah! We wiped out every last monster in
Dwachakka! This doesn't even come close!

269866.「ここまで お前を見てて\n その実力は 理解してるさ。\n へへっ 信じてるぜ:
I've had my eye on you for awhile now and I
think I know what you're capable of, heh heh!
I believe in you, <if_woman>sister<else>brother<endif>!

269891.「も もう一度 １００万……。\n あんなに 大変だったのに……。:
A...another million...after everything we
went through...

269893.「すまねぇ……みんな。\n オレのワガママに 付きあわせたせいで\n こんなこと:
I'm sorry, guys... Because of my selfishness,
you all had to go through with this...
I'm really sorry...

271221.「ウハハハハハハッ！\n ボロ儲けだーーーーっ！\n 笑いが 止まんねえーーーっ:
Ahahahahah!! I'm rich, I'm rich!
I'm getting all giddy just thinking about it!

271222.「調子にのっちゃって もう……。\n 兄者の金じゃないんだからね。:
Don't get too carried away...you know that
money doesn't belong to you, right?

271223.「おいおい クリュトスさんよぉ～。\n 約束通り １００万ゴールド 稼いだぜ！\:
Hey, hey, Mr. Krutos! We've earned one
million Gold as promised! We've passed the
trial without a hitch, right?

271224.「そのようですね。それでは……: It does seem so. Now then...

271225.<center>忌々しい ……ちども\nその…… すべて 我によこせ……。:
How annoying and detestable....
All of your... give it to me....

271227.「するぞ……するぞ……。\n 人々を堕落させる 金のにおいだ……。:
That scent...that terrible scent...
The scent of money leading to corruption...

271228.「我が名は 厄魔ポヴァディウス……。\n そこな金は すべて いただいてゆく……:
My name is Povadius, and I shall take all
ill-gotten wealth...

271230.「う 売り上げ金 全部 持ってかれちまった。\n こういう場合 試練ってどうなる:
W...we lost all the money that we earned!
What does this mean for the trial?!

271231.「僕が １００万ゴールド分の\n 感謝のエネルギーを回収することで\n 試練は完:
I did say that the trial would be complete
after collecting one million Gold worth of
Gratituity.

271232.「こうして エネルギーを回収する前に \n 売り上げ金が 奪われてしまった以上\:
And since your earnings were taken before it
could be collected...that means the trial
still has yet to be completed.

271234.「ふんがーーーーッ！！\n あのガイコツ野郎 ナメた真似しやがって！！\n 落と:
Hrrrrrrghhh!!
That bony bastard thinks he can make fools out
of us! He's got another thing coming!!

271235.「<pc>！ お前だって\n 汗水たらして 稼いだ金を奪われて\n 腹が立つだろ:
<pc>! You're upset that your
hard-earned money was taken away
as well, right?!<yesno><close>

271236.「くぅ～～～～っ！\n お前ってヤツは どこまで お人好しなんだよ！\n だが:
Hrrrrghhh! Are you really that much of a
pushover?! I can't bring myself to forgive
that monster!

271238.「やられたら やり返す！\n オレたちの金を 取り戻しに行くぞ！！:
You push us, and we'll push back even harder!
Let's go and get our money back!!

271239.「感謝のエネルギーを 悪用されれば\n ここだけではなく 天星郷全体に\n 被害:
If that Gratituity were to be abused, not only
is this place at risk, but the entirety of the
Firmament as well...

271241.「この黄金の試練場から 悪しきものが出ないよう\n 見えない結界を張りました。こ:
I've just erected a ward that will keep that
monster from leaving the Golden Trial.
He won't be able to escape now.

271242.「試練場の西に移動した この邪悪な気配……\n どうやら ここを建てる以前に 使:
I sense his evil presence has moved to the west side of the trial area...he appears to have taken refuge in an old temple we
used before this place was built.

271243.「古い神殿は 西にあるファボル鉱山の中です。\n あなたたちの 試練の達成のため:
That old temple is located in the Fabol Mine
to the west. Please go and retrieve the safe
so you may complete your trial.

271244.「よーし！\n 英雄様を怒らせたら どうなるか……\n あの野郎に しっかり教え:
All right! Let's show that bag of bones what
happens when you mess with a champion!

271245.「ククク……集まったぞ。アストルティア中の\n 金持ちどもから 奪ってきた金……:
Keh heh heh...it's all here. All the Gold I've
stolen from Astoltia's richest... It's all
mine, every last coin of it...

271246.「グォォォォォオ……ッ！\n 金が チリにぃぃぃッ！！:
RAAAAAAAAAGHHHH!!!
The money turned to dust?!

271247.「まただ！ なぜ……我は こんな目に……！！: Not again!! Why....does this happen to me...?!

271248.「なんだぁ アイツ……\n 金に触れることが できないのか？\n それなら なん:
What is with this guy...? Can he not touch
money or something? Then why is he
stealing it...?

271249.「やいやいやいッ！\n この 売り上げドロボー！！\n オレたちの金を とっとと:
Hey, you! You damn thief! Give us back our
money, or else!!

271250.「オォォオ……ッ！\n 我の邪魔を するなぁぁぁ……！！:
Rrrrrrrrr.......
Do NOT get in my way.....!!

271251.「危なかった……！ ケガはない？: That was close...! Are you okay?

271253.「なぜ 我は こんな呪いを……。\n 貴様ら金持ちなど 許さぬ……許さぬぞぉ……:
Why am I cursed like this...? I will never
forgive the rich... NEVER...!!

271254.「貴様らの金……\n 全部 我に よこせぇぇぇぇぇ！！！:
All of your money...
GIVE IT TO ME!!!!!!!

271255.「……とはいえ これじゃ キリがねえな。: ...is this ever gonna end, or what?

271256.「<cs_pchero>！\n オレたちが ザコどもを 食い止める！\n その間:
<cs_pchero>! We'll hold these
little guys off! You take care of that bony
bastard and teach him a lesson!

271257.「よっしゃ！ 金庫を取り戻したぜ！\n 中身も無事のようだし これで試練は合格だ:
Yesss! We got the safe back! Everything seems
to still be inside, so the trial is as good as
passed!

271258.「そ そんな……。\n まだ 立ち上がってくるなんて……。:
N...no way...
He's able to stand back up...?

271259.「上等だ！ そっちが その気なら\n 何度だって たたきつぶしてやるよッ！！:
Leave it to me! If you're so determined to
stand back up, I'll just keep knocking you
back down!!

271260.「金持ちも……神も 天使も 許さない。\n なぜ 我にこのような むごい運命を\:
The rich, the gods, the angels...I will never
forgive them....why have you cursed me to
suffer such a horrible fate...?!!

271261.「なぁ……。\n お前の 本当の願いはなんだ？:
Hey...
What is your true wish?

271262.「どうも オレには お前が しんどい運命に\n 苦しんでいるようにしか 見えない:
It's clear to me that you're burdened with a
difficult fate. I don't think money is what
you're truly after, is it?

271263.「どうして こんな 理不尽な目に\n あわなくちゃならない……。\n オレも 穴:
"Why can life be so unfair?" That's something
I thought every single day while cooped up
in a hole in the ground...

271264.「だから お前の気持ちが よくわかる。\n お前は 怒りで 本当にほしいものを\:
So...I know exactly how you feel. You've
become so angry that you've lost sight of
what you really want.

271265.「本当の願いは なんだ？ 言ってみろ。\n オレたちが お前の願いを かなえてや:
What is your true wish? Tell us!
We'll make sure to grant it!

271266.「……我の話を 聞いてくれるというのか？: ...you really mean to listen to me?

271267.「ア……俺 俺だって……こんな風に\n なりたかったわけじゃない。\n 貧しさか:
I...I never wanted to be like this....
I only wanted to escape a life of poverty...

271268.「俺は……かつて ただの人間だった。\n 貧乏な家に生まれ その日の食いぶちにも:
I was...once a mere human. I was born into a
very poor family...and every day I lived with
barely enough food to survive...

271269.「どんなに真面目に働いても それは変わらない。\n 親が作った １００万ゴールド:
No matter how hard I worked, nothing changed. I couldn't even pay back the one million Gold debt my parents burdened me with...every
passing day where I couldn't repay it was filled with despair...

271270.「俺に こんな運命を背負わせた 神が憎い。\n 俺たちの犠牲の上に立っている 金:
I loathe the gods for causing me to suffer this fate. I loathe the rich who stand upon our sacrifices. Such thoughts consumed my
mind every day...

271271.「その日……俺は ついに 盗みを働いた。\n とある富豪が 秘蔵していた古いメダ:
And one day...I finally stole something. It was an old medal that a wealthy man kept hidden. Unbeknownst to me, however...
that medal was harboring a demon.

271272.「俺のような 盗みを働く愚か者を\n そいつは ずっと待っていたのだろう。\n:
I suppose that demon was waiting for a thief
like me for quite some time. When it appeared
before me, it said...

271273.「ケケ……。哀れな男……。\n オレが お前の借金を肩代わりしてやろう。\n 金:
"Keh heh...you poor man. I shall take on the burden of your debt in your place, as well as grant you the power to take revenge against
the wealthy."

271274.「その代わり……\n お前の魂を オレに よこしな。\n それで お前の願いは:
"In exchange...you must give me your soul.
Only then will your wish be granted..."

271275.「俺は 悪魔の誘惑に 抗うことができず\n ヤツに 魂を売り渡した……。\n そ:
I couldn't resist that demon's temptation in
selling my soul to him...and that is how I
gained this power.

271276.「だが 悪魔は やはり悪魔だ。ヤツは\n 俺に 永遠に続く金への渇望と 金に触れ:
But a demon is still a demon. He left me with
an everlasting thirst for money, and a curse
that causes it to decay upon touching it...

271277.「どんなに 金を奪っても 触れることはできず\n この渇望と苦しみから 逃れるす:
No matter how much money I took, I could not
touch it...there is no escape from this thirst
and this suffering...

271278.「心の奥底にあった願いに 導かれたのか 俺は\n 他のヤツと同じように あの神殿:
Perhaps guided by a wish rooted deeply in my
heart, I ended up at that other temple...
Please...put an end to this misery...

271279.「ケケ……バカな野郎だねぇ。\n 簡単に だまされちゃってさ！:
Keh, keh...you bone-headed fool!
How easily deceived you are!

271280.「オレが 肩代わりした借金を\n 返さない限り 呪いは解けやしない。\n お前に:
Until you pay back the debt that I shouldered
from you, your curse will never be lifted.
But for you, that is impossible!

271281.「コイツが ポヴァディウスに\n 呪いをかけた 悪魔か……！\n ヘドが出そうな:
So that's the demon who put that awful curse
on Povadius...?! How despicable! You make me
sick!

271282.「永遠に逃れることのできない 地獄の中で\n 苦しみ続けなければ ならないなんて:
To be trapped in an eternal and inescapable
life of suffering...
Is there no way we can help...?

271283.「もしかして ボクたちの稼いだ\n １００万ゴールドで 借金を返せば\n 彼を:
Perhaps...we can help him by paying off his
debt with the one million Gold that we've
earned...?

271284.「だけど そんなことをしたら\n 試練は……。: But if we did that, then the trial...

271286.「コイツを見殺しにして 試練に合格したって\n ちっとも うれしくねえ。目の前で:
I won't be happy if I pass the trial only to
leave this man to die. If I see someone who
is suffering, I'd risk my life to help them!

271287.「それが！ オレたち 英雄のなすべきことだ。\n コイツを……救ってやろうぜ！<:
And that's what we champions do! Come on...
Let's save him!<yesno><close>

271288.「お前も 英雄だろ？\n ここでコイツを見捨てるなんて できるもんか。\n 一緒:
You're a champion too, right? We can't just
abandon him here, can we? Let's save him
together!<yesno><close>

271290.「よっしゃ！ 金なんて\n パーッと使って ナンボだ！\n 派手にいくぜぇーーー:
All right! Money is meant to be spent, after
all! Let's go out with a bang!!

271291.「おい！ そこの悪魔！\n １００万ゴールド 耳をそろえて \n キッチリ返して:
Hey, you demon! Here's one million Gold,
fair and square! Go on, take it!

271292.「食らえッ！ １００万ゴールド分のぉ……: Take this!! The value of a million Gold...

271294.「ヒイィィッ！ アイタタタターーーッ！\n こ こんな 乱暴な借金の返し方が\n:
Aiiiiiiiiiieeeee!!!! Ouch, ouch, ouch!!!!
How dare you pay back my debt like
this?!

271296.「人間に 戻れた……。\n 俺は 自由なのか……？:
I'm...I'm human again...
Am I free...?

271297.「ありがとう……。やっと 金の地獄から解放され\n 俺は救われました。あなたたち:
Thank you...I am finally free from the misery
of money... Meeting all of you, it was
truly...a blessing...

271299.<cs_pchero>と三闘士は\n売り上げ金を すべて 失ってしまった……。\:
<cs_pchero> and the Triad lost all
of the money they had earned... Go and speak
with Krutos in the Gratitemple.

271300.「あの者から 金庫を\n 取り戻してくださったことについては\n 礼を言いましょ:
I would like to express my thanks for
retrieving the safe and bringing it back
here...

271301.「しかし！ 人々から集めたお金……\n 感謝のエネルギーが 回収できない以上\n:
However...the Gratituity was not collected
from the money you earned, so your Soul
Candelabras cannot be lit.

271302.「残念ですが もう一度 最初から\n １００万ゴールド 稼ぎなおしてください。:
I hate to say it, but you'll have to start all
over again and earn another million Gold.

271303.「兄者は アイツを救うため 金を使ったんだ！\n しかたなかったんだよ！\n な:
We spent all the money to save that man!
Isn't there anything you can do about that?!

271305.「今さら なぁーに 言ってんだい！\n こちとら 兄者のワガママなんて\n もう:
Why are you saying that now all of a sudden?
We're already used to your selfishness!

271306.「だ 大丈夫だよ。 \n 兄ちゃんの選択は 決して 間違ってない。\n だから:
I...it's okay. You made the right decision.
So just cheer up, okay...?

271308.「いらっしゃいませ！\n また 来てくださったのですね……:
Welcome, welcome! I see you've come to visit
us again...

271310.「ふむ……自分は ちいさなメダルを\n 探していただけなので ありますが……。\:
Well...I was in the middle of looking for some
Mini Medals, but...how did I end up here?

271312.「彼は メダル・オーナー ゴーレック様。\n 現代のアストルティアで 一・二を争:
This is Mr. Golek, the Medal Owner. He is
currently one of Astoltia's richest men, and
often comes here looking for Mini Medals.

271313.「ゴーレック様ほどの 尽きせぬ願望を持つ者は\n アストルティアの歴史を さかの:
Few individuals in the history of Astoltia
barely come close to matching the insatiable
desires of Mr. Golek here...

271316.「あなた！ あなたが 持っている\n それは なんでありますか！？\n 自分に:
You! What is that object that you are holding
in your hand? Please show it to me!

271318.「この世界に ちいさなメダルをもたらした\n メダル仙人様が 作ったとされる 伝:
The legendary treasure created by the Medal
Meister himself, who brought Mini Medals to
this world...it's the Ancient Mini Medal!!

271319.「この美しさ さりげなさ……\n 太古の息吹を感じさせる ワビとサビ！\n なん:
Its beauty, its simplicity...it truly emanates
the essence of antiquity! It is certainly
magnificent, indeed...

271320.「あなたっ！\n これは おいくらでありますかっ！？: You there! How much does this cost?!

271321.「いくらでも 払うであります！\n １００万ゴールドで いかがでありましょう！？:
I will pay as much as you want! How does
one million Gold sound?!

271323.「……ダメでありますか？\n では １億…………:
...is that a no? Then how about one hundred
million...?

271324.「ダメじゃない！ ダメじゃない……です！\n １００万ゴールドで 売ります！\n:
No, no! It's fine, it's fine! We'll sell it
to you for one million Gold! That
price is fine!

271325.「おおっ！ ありがとうであります！\n 幻のお宝が こんな安く 手に入るなんて\:
Ahaha! Thank you so much! How lucky I am to
get such a rare treasure at such a cheap
price!

271326.<pc>たちは ゴーレックに\nきたないメダルを １００万ゴールドで売った！:
<pc> sold the Dirty Medal to Golek
for 1,000,000 Gold!

271327.「……方法は ともあれ あなたたちは\n １００万ゴールドを稼ぐことに 成功しま:
Regardless of how it was done, you have earned
one million Gold. I'll now collect the
Gratituity from the sale.

271329.「審判の天使クリュトスの名において\n あなたたちの 黄金の試練の合格を\n こ:
In the name of Krutos, Angel of Judgment,
I hereby declare that you have passed the
Golden Trial. Well done!

271330.「それから……こちらを。\n 試練を達成した あなたたちへ\n 僕からの お祝い:
I'd like you to take this as well...it's my
way of congratulating you for making it
through the trial.

271331.<pc>が持つ\n魂の燭台に 炎が灯った！:
The Soul Candelabra that <pc> was
holding has been lit!

271332.「自らの意志を つらぬいたうえで\n このような奇跡を 呼びこむなんて……\n:
To bring forth a miracle like that after
following what you believe in...
You are truly champions indeed.

271333.「一時は どうなることかと思ったけど\n 無事 試練を突破できて よかったな！:
I was worried about what was gonna happen
there for a second, but I'm so glad that we
all passed with flying colors!

271334.「まったくだよ……。\n 最初から やり直しって 言われたときは\n 心臓が止ま:
Sheesh...when he said that we had to start
over, I thought my heart was going to stop...

271335.「アンタ 最初は 頼りなさそうなヤツだと\n 思ったが なかなか やるじゃないか:
My first impression was that you weren't the
most reliable person...but you're actually
pretty good!

271336.「あなたが いたから\n ボクたちも がんばれたんだよ。\n 本当に ありがとう:
And because you were there with us, we were
able to do our best. Thank you so much!

271337.「みんな お前のことを 気に入ったようだし\n どうだ？ オレたちに加わって\n:
It seems that we've all taken a liking to you.
How about it? Why not join us as the Earthen
Tetrad?<yesno><close>

271338.「ガッハッハ！ 残念 フラれちまったぜ！\n だが その気になったら いつでも言:
Gahahah! You turned me down, too bad! But
whenever you think you're ready, just give me
a holler! You're more than welcome to join!

271339.「よっしゃ！ お前なら 大歓迎だぜ！\n じゃ 一緒に 次の試練に行くとするか！:
Yeaaah! You're more than welcome to join!
Okay, off to the next trial together!

271340.「……って これから オレたちが挑戦する\n 白灰の試練は もう合格済みなのか。:
...but you're saying you've already passed
the White Ash Trial? That's a shame...I guess
for now we'll go our separate ways.

271341.「……これで 偉大なるチカラに 一歩近づいた。:
Now we are one step closer to gaining that
great power...

271342.「ドワチャッカ大陸を 守るという\n ただひとつの夢を 現実にするために\n オ:
We have to keep on moving forward to make
our dream of protecting Dwachakka a reality!
We can't afford to stop now!

271343.「じゃあな <pc>！\n フォーリオンで 必ず また会おうぜ！\n 約束だから:
See ya, <pc>! We'll see you back
in Fourion for sure! Promise!

273980.黄金の試練に 合格した。\n四天の星巡りを すべて終えるために\n残りの試練に:
You have passed the Golden Trial.
Make your way to the remaining trials to
